q: top limit. Second, the judges on "X Factor" mentor the contestants. Each judge works with three or four finalists- then comes back to judge them against the other finalists. It can become even more competitive among the judges than the contestants, Simon Cowell said, "because we don't have to pretend we like each other." And sure, said Simon Cowell , "There will be some bias" among the judges toward the contestants they mentor
